百不雜.definition: variant of 百不咋[bai3 bu4 za5]

百位.definition: the hundreds place (or column) in the decimal system

百倍.definition: a hundredfold; (fig.) markedly; to increase markedly (transitive or intransitive) (often in reference to abstract attributes)

百兒八十.definition: about a hundred; a hundred or so

百出.definition: (following a noun) full of ...; abounding in ...

百分之百.definition: a hundred percent; out and out; absolutely

百利甜.definition: Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink); see also 百利甜酒[Bai3 li4 Tian2 jiu3]

百利甜酒.definition: Baileys Irish Cream (brand of alcoholic drink)

百勝.definition: BaiSheng, common name for Chinese company; PakSing, common Hong Kong company name

百勝難慮敵，三折乃良醫.pinyin: bai3 sheng4 nan2 lu:4 di2 , san1 zhe2 nai3 liang2 yi1
百勝難慮敵，三折乃良醫.definition: (a line from a poem by the Tang poet Liu Yuxi 劉禹錫|刘禹锡[Liu2 Yu3 xi1]) one gains very little insight into one's enemy from a hundred victories, but he who breaks his arm three times will be a good doctor; (fig.) one learns more from one's failures than from one's successes

百勝餐飲.definition: Tricon Global Restaurants (incl. Pizza Hut and KFC)

百勝餐飲集團.pinyin: Bai3 sheng4 Can1 yin3 Ji2 tuan2
百勝餐飲集團.definition: Yum! Brands, Inc., American fast food corporation operating Pizza Hut, KFC etc.

百卉千葩.definition: myriad plants and flowers (idiom); rich and colorful

百口莫辯.definition: (idiom) (of sb unfairly accused) to have all one's protestations fall on deaf ears; to be unable to convince sb of one's innocence

百合花.definition: lily; fig. pure and spotless person; virgin

百善孝為先.definition: of all virtues filial piety is most important (idiom)

百團大戰.definition: Hundred Regiments offensive of August-December 1940, a large scale offensive against the Japanese by the communists

百姿千態.definition: in different poses and with different expressions; in thousands of postures (idiom)

百媚千嬌.definition: see 千嬌百媚|千娇百媚[qian1jiao1-bai3mei4]

百孔千瘡.definition: heavily damaged; (fig.) full of holes; riddled with problems

百家.definition: many schools of thought; many people or households

百家姓.definition: The Book of Family Names, anonymous Song dynasty reading primer listing 438 surnames

百家爭鳴.definition: a hundred schools of thought contend (idiom); refers to the classical philosophic schools of the Warring States period 475-221 BC

百尺竿頭.definition: to be at the highest level of enlightenment (Buddhist expression)

百尺竿頭，更進一步.pinyin: bai3 chi3 gan1 tou2 , geng4 jin4 yi1 bu4
百尺竿頭，更進一步.definition: lit. after climbing a hundred feet up a pole, one should go even further (idiom); fig. even if one has achieved a measure of success, one should strive to do even better

百川歸海.definition: all things tend in one direction (idiom)

百年不遇.definition: only met with once every hundred years (drought, flood etc)

百年大計.definition: a project of vital and lasting importance

百年好合.definition: may you live a long and happy life together (wedding greeting)

百年樹人.definition: (idiom) it takes many years to raise children to be upstanding citizens

百度.definition: Baidu, Internet portal and search engine, www.baidu.com, listed as BIDU on NASDAQ since 1999

百度知道.definition: Baidu Knows, online Q & A forum, zhidao.baidu.com

百廢俱興.definition: all neglected tasks are being undertaken (idiom); work is now underway

百廢具興.definition: variant of 百廢俱興|百废俱兴[bai3 fei4 ju4 xing1]

百廢待興.definition: many things waiting to be done (idiom); a thousand things to do

百廢待舉.definition: many things waiting to be done (idiom); a thousand things to do

百思不得其解.pinyin: bai3 si1 bu4 de2 qi2 jie3
百思不得其解.definition: see 百思不解[bai3 si1 bu4 jie3]

百思不解.definition: to remain puzzled after pondering over sth a hundred times (idiom); to remain perplexed despite much thought

百思莫解.definition: see 百思不解[bai3 si1 bu4 jie3]

百感交集.definition: all sorts of feelings well up in one's heart

百戰不殆.definition: to come unscathed through a hundred battles (idiom, from Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3]); to win every fight

百戰百勝.definition: to emerge victorious in every battle; to be ever-victorious

百折不回.definition: see 百折不撓|百折不挠[bai3 zhe2 bu4 nao2]

百折不撓.definition: to keep on fighting in spite of all setbacks (idiom); to be undaunted by repeated setbacks; to be indomitable

百日維新.definition: Hundred Days Reform (1898), failed attempt to reform the Qing dynasty

百會穴.definition: (TCM) acupuncture point GV-20, located at the top of the head

百濟.definition: Paekche or Baekje (18 BC-660 AD), one of the Korean Three Kingdoms

百無一失.definition: no danger of anything going wrong; no risk at all

百無禁忌.definition: all taboos are off (idiom); anything goes; nothing is taboo

百無聊賴.definition: (idiom) bored to death; bored stiff; overcome with boredom

百煉成鋼.definition: to be tempered into a steel

百獸.definition: all creatures; every kind of animal

百發百中.definition: lit. one hundred shots, one hundred hits (idiom); fig. to shoot with unfailing accuracy; to hit the mark every time

百科.definition: universal; encyclopedic; abbr. for 百科全書|百科全书[bai3 ke1 quan2 shu1]

百穀.definition: all the grains; every kind of cereal crop

百端待舉.definition: a thousand things remain to be done (idiom); numerous tasks remain to be undertaken

百粵.definition: Baiyue, generic term for southern ethnic groups; also written 百越

百聞不如一見.pinyin: bai3 wen2 bu4 ru2 yi1 jian4
百聞不如一見.definition: seeing once is better than hearing a hundred times (idiom); seeing for oneself is better than hearing from many others; seeing is believing

百般.definition: in hundred and one ways; in every possible way; by every means

百般刁難.definition: (idiom) to put up innumerable obstacles; to create all kinds of difficulties

百般奉承.definition: to fawn upon sb in every possible way

百般巴結.definition: to flatter someone in a hundred different ways; assiduous fawning (idiom)

百色市.definition: Baise, prefecture-level city in Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region 廣西壯族自治區|广西壮族自治区[Guang3xi1 Zhuang4zu2 Zi4zhi4qu1]

百花園.definition: Garden of Many Flowers (name); Baihua garden in Hongmiao village 洪廟村|洪庙村[Hong2 miao4 cun1], Shandong

百花獎.definition: Hundred Flowers Awards, film prize awarded since 1962

百花運動.definition: Hundred Flowers Campaign (PRC, 1956-57), in which Mao called for the taboo on discussing mistakes of the CCP to be lifted

百花齊放.definition: a hundred flowers bloom (idiom); let the arts have free expression

百花齊放，百家爭鳴.pinyin: bai3 hua1 qi2 fang4 , bai3 jia1 zheng1 ming2
百花齊放，百家爭鳴.definition: a hundred flowers bloom, a hundred schools of thought contend (idiom); refers to the classical philosophic schools of the Warring States period 475-221 BC, but adopted for Mao's campaign of 1956

百草.definition: all kinds of grass; all kinds of flora

百萬位.definition: the millions place (or column) in the decimal system

百葉.definition: tripe (stomach lining of cattle etc used as food)

百葉箱.definition: Stevenson screen (white box with ventilated sides, housing meteorological instruments); thermometer screen; instrument shelter

百裡挑一.definition: one in a hundred; cream of the crop

百計千方.definition: to exhaust every means to achieve sth (idiom)

百讀不厭.definition: to be worth reading a hundred times (idiom)

百越.definition: Baiyue, generic term for southern ethnic groups

百足之蟲死而不僵.pinyin: bai3 zu2 zhi1 chong2 si3 er2 bu4 jiang1
百足之蟲死而不僵.definition: a centipede dies but never falls down; old institutions die hard

百頁窗.definition: variant of 百葉窗|百叶窗[bai3 ye4 chuang1]
